articles.description: Follow BBC live text coverage as France face Jamaica in Group F of the 2023 Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up as France face Jamaica

articles.description: Follow live text, Test Match Special commentary and in-play clips from the fifth day of the fourth Ashes Test between England and Australia at Emirates Old Trafford.
articles.title: Ashes build-up: Will England take final five Australia wickets to win?

articles.description: Stefanie van der Gragt's first-half header gives the Netherlands a 1-0 win against Portugal in the Women's World Cup in Dunedin.
articles.title: Van der Gragt gives Netherlands win over Portugal

articles.description: Amanda Ilestedt's last-minute header gives Sweden a 2-1 win over South Africa at the Women's World Cup in Wellington.
articles.title: Ilestedt scores late as Sweden beat South Africa

articles.description: Watch highlights as Sweden's Amanda Ilestedt scores a late winner to lead her side to victory over South Africa at the Fifa Women's World Cup in Wellington.
articles.title: Late Sweden winner earns opening win over South Africa

articles.description: Brian Harman is accustomed to hunting deer but he was shooting fish in a barrel at the 151st Open at Royal Liverpool.
articles.title: Hunter becomes hunted... but can anyone stop Harman?

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler, Jon Rahm and Rory McIlroy all feature in the selection of best shots from the third round of the Open Championship at Royal Liverpool.
articles.title: Scheffler, Rahm & McIlroy in day three's best shots at The Open

articles.description: Manchester United and Brazil full-back Alex Telles signs for Al-Nassr, joining up with former United team-mate Cristiano Ronaldo.
articles.title: Man Utd full-back Telles signs for Al-Nassr

articles.description: From his ruthless performance against Marcin Tybura at UFC London to targeting Jon Jones - there is a new assertiveness about Tom Aspinall.
articles.title: 'Jones knows I exist!' - Aspinall targets UFC belt

articles.description: New Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes says "you should be as natural as you can" when leading the team.
articles.title: I will not change as Man Utd captain - Fernandes
